question: 野暮
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>field</kanji> of <kanji>livelihood</kanji> is so lively! Look at everything jumping around. It is so fresh and new and awesome! That being said, being so lively and fresh and new, it's pretty <vocabulary>unrefined</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>rustic</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
